popular.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
popular.author: Steve Jobs

popular.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
popular.author: Robert Frost

popular.quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
popular.author: Oscar Wilde

popular.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
popular.author: Wayne Gretzky

popular.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
popular.author: Confucius

popular.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
popular.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

popular.quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
popular.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

popular.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
popular.author: Albert Schweitzer

popular.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
popular.author: Peter Drucker

popular.quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
popular.author: Walt Disney

popular.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
popular.author: Nelson Mandela

popular.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
popular.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

popular.quote: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
popular.author: Albert Einstein

popular.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
popular.author: Albert Einstein

popular.quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
popular.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

popular.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
popular.author: Theodore Roosevelt

popular.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
popular.author: Confucius

popular.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it 20% with what we think about it and 80% with how we feel about it.
popular.author: unknown

popular.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
popular.author: Steve Jobs

popular.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
popular.author: Unknown

popular.quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
popular.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

popular.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
popular.author: Wayne Gretzky

popular.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
popular.author: Sam Levenson

popular.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
popular.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

popular.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
popular.author: Nelson Mandela

popular.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
popular.author: Albert Schweitzer

popular.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
popular.author: Peter Drucker

popular.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
popular.author: Albert Einstein

popular.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
popular.author: Confucius

popular.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
popular.author: Frank Sinatra

love.quote: Love is not finding someone to live with, it's finding someone you can't imagine living without.
love.author: Unknown

love.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
love.author: Maya Angelou

love.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
love.author: Aristotle

love.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
love.author: Audrey Hepburn

love.quote: I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
love.author: Roy Croft

love.quote: Love is an endless act of forgiveness. Forgiveness is an endless act of love.
love.author: Unknown

love.quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that’s everything.
love.author: T. Tolis

love.quote: I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I’ve ever had.
love.author: Nicholas Sparks

love.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you, I could walk through my garden forever.
love.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

love.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
love.author: Nicholas Sparks

love.quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
love.author: Loretta Young

love.quote: You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.
love.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

love.quote: To the world, you may be one person, but to one person you may be the world.
love.author: Unknown

love.quote: I choose you. And I'll choose you over and over and over. Without pause, without a doubt, in a heartbeat. I'll keep choosing you.
love.author: Unknown

love.quote: Love is not about how many days, months, or years you have been together. Love is about how much you love each other every single day.
love.author: Unknown

love.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close.
love.author: Pablo Neruda

love.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
love.author: Nicholas Sparks

love.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
love.author: A.A. Milne

love.quote: I have decided to stick to love...Hate is too great a burden to bear.
love.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

love.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by Nature and embroidered by imagination.
love.author: Voltaire

love.quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.
love.author: Paulo Coelho

love.quote: Love is not just looking at each other, it's looking in the same direction.
love.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

love.quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
love.author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

love.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
love.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.

love.quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
love.author: David Viscott

love.quote: Love is like a friendship caught on fire. In the beginning, a flame, very pretty, often hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. As love grows older, our hearts mature and our love becomes as coals, deep-burning and unquenchable.
love.author: Bruce Lee

love.quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
love.author: Maya Angelou

love.quote: To love someone is to see a miracle invisible to others.
love.author: François Mauriac

love.quote: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
love.author: Oscar Wilde

love.quote: The best love is the one that makes you a better person without changing you into someone other than yourself.
love.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm writing a book. I've got the page numbers done.
humor.author: Steven Wright

humor.quote: I'm not arguing, I'm just explaining why I'm right.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm on the seafood diet. I see food and I eat it.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: My doctor told me to watch my drinking. Now I drink in front of a mirror.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not lazy, I'm on energy-saving mode.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She seemed surprised.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I used to play piano by ear, but now I use my hands.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not a vegetarian because I love animals. I'm a vegetarian because I hate plants.
humor.author: A. Whitney Brown

humor.quote: My bed is a magical place where I suddenly remember everything I forgot to do.
humor.author: Unknown

humor.quote: I'm not crazy. My reality is just different than yours.
humor.author: Cheshire Cat (Alice in Wonderland)

anime.quote: I'm not a hero because I want your approval. I do it because I want to.
anime.author: Saitama - One Punch Man

anime.quote: It's not the face that makes someone a monster. It's the choices they make with their lives.
anime.author: Naruto Uzumaki - Naruto

anime.quote: No matter how deep the night, it always turns to day, eventually.
anime.author: Brook - One Piece

anime.quote: No one knows what the future holds. That's why its potential is infinite.
anime.author: Rintarou Okabe - Steins;Gate

anime.quote: I want to be a potato.
anime.author: Sasha Blouse - Attack on Titan

anime.quote: It's okay not to be okay as long as you are willing to fight.
anime.author: Mirio Togata - My Hero Academia

anime.quote: To know sorrow is not terrifying. What is terrifying is to know you can't go back to happiness you could have.
anime.author: Matsumoto Rangiku - Bleach

anime.quote: People die if they are killed.
anime.author: Shirou Emiya - Fate/stay night

anime.quote: A lesson without pain is meaningless. For you cannot gain something without sacrificing something else in return.
anime.author: Edward Elric - Fullmetal Alchemist

anime.quote: The world is not beautiful, therefore it is.
anime.author: Kino - Kino's Journey

anime.quote: If you have time to think of a beautiful end, then live beautifully until the end.
anime.author: Sakata Gintoki - Gintama

anime.quote: It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.
anime.author: Naruto Uzumaki - Naruto

anime.quote: Whatever you lose, you'll find it again. But what you throw away you'll never get back.
anime.author: Kenshin Himura - Rurouni Kenshin

anime.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
anime.author: Peter Drucker

anime.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
anime.author: Albert Einstein

anime.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
anime.author: Confucius

anime.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
anime.author: Frank Sinatra

anime.quote: The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
anime.author: Lelouch vi Britannia - Code Geass

anime.quote: Even if I'm weak, I'll still use my fists to protect you.
anime.author: Natsu Dragneel - Fairy Tail

anime.quote: If you don't like your destiny, don't accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be.
anime.author: Ursula Callistis - Little Witch Academia

anime.quote: It's not the face that makes someone a monster, it's the choices they make with their lives.
anime.author: Naruto Uzumaki - Naruto

anime.quote: Whatever you lose, you'll find it again. But what you throw away you'll never get back.
anime.author: Kenshin Himura - Rurouni Kenshin

anime.quote: If you have time to think of a beautiful end, then live beautifully until the end.
anime.author: Sakata Gintoki - Gintama

anime.quote: The only way to deal with this life is to find someone who will love you for no reason.
anime.author: Hachiman Hikigaya - My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU

anime.quote: It's not the face that makes someone a monster. It's the choices they make with their lives.
anime.author: Naruto Uzumaki - Naruto

anime.quote: The only ones who should kill are those who are prepared to be killed.
anime.author: Lelouch vi Britannia - Code Geass

anime.quote: Even if I'm weak, I'll still use my fists to protect you.
anime.author: Natsu Dragneel - Fairy Tail

motivational.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
motivational.author: Sam Levenson

motivational.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
motivational.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
motivational.author: Albert Schweitzer

motivational.quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
motivational.author: Nelson Mandela

motivational.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
motivational.author: Christian D. Larson

motivational.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.quote: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
motivational.author: George Washington

motivational.quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
motivational.author: Zig Ziglar

motivational.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
motivational.author: Unknown

motivational.quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
motivational.author: C.S. Lewis

motivational.quote: The harder I work, the luckier I get.
motivational.author: Gary Player

motivational.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
motivational.author: Wayne Gretzky

motivational.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
motivational.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

motivational.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
motivational.author: Peter Drucker

motivational.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

motivational.quote: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
motivational.author: Vince Lombardi

motivational.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
motivational.author: Mahatma Gandhi

motivational.quote: The only thing standing between you and your dream is the will to try and the belief that it is actually possible.
motivational.author: Joel Brown

indianAuthors.quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
indianAuthors.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

indianAuthors.quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
indianAuthors.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

indianAuthors.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
indianAuthors.author: Steve Jobs

indianAuthors.quote: Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle.
indianAuthors.author: Christian D. Larson

indianAuthors.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
indianAuthors.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

indianAuthors.quote: The harder the conflict, the greater the triumph.
indianAuthors.author: George Washington

indianAuthors.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
indianAuthors.author: Mahatma Gandhi

indianAuthors.quote: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
indianAuthors.author: Mahatma Gandhi

indianAuthors.quote: The soul is neither born, and nor does it die.
indianAuthors.author: Bhagavad Gita

indianAuthors.quote: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
indianAuthors.author: Mahatma Gandhi

indianAuthors.quote: The whole world is a family.
indianAuthors.author: Mahatma Gandhi

indianAuthors.quote: The mind is everything. What you think, you become.
indianAuthors.author: Gautama Buddha

indianAuthors.quote: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to yourself and others.
indianAuthors.author: Gautama Buddha

indianAuthors.quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
indianAuthors.author: Gautama Buddha

shortPoetry.quote:
Beneath the stars, our souls take flight,
In the realm of dreams, we find our light.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Whispers of wind, secrets untold,
Nature's stories, written in gold.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Morning dew on petals pure,
A symphony of nature, so demure.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Sunset's embrace, colors ignite,
Painting the world with hues so bright.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
In your eyes, a universe I see,
Love's constellation, forever free.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Time's river flows, an endless song,
Carrying memories, where they belong.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Whispers of trees, wisdom they share,
Nature's library, open and rare.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Moonlight's kiss on tranquil sea,
Love's reflection, you and me.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Stars above, dreams unfold,
In the night, stories of old.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Silent echoes of hearts entwine,
In the dance of souls, you are mine.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Footprints fade on sands of time,
But love's imprint remains, sublime.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Raindrops fall, a soothing rhyme,
Nature's poetry, in every chime.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Sunrise paints the world anew,
Hope arises, dreams come true.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Life's journey, an open page,
In every step, a new stage.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Autumn leaves, a tapestry bold,
Stories of change, in colors told.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
In the silence, stars converse,
Cosmic poetry, the universe.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Love's melody, a gentle breeze,
Whispering secrets through rustling trees.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Heartbeats sync with ocean's roar,
Love's rhythm echoes forevermore.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Sky's canvas, painted with care,
A masterpiece born from open air.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

shortPoetry.quote:
Dreams take flight on night's embrace,
Stars and wishes interlace.
shortPoetry.author: Unknown

lifeLessons.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
lifeLessons.author: Charles R. Swindoll

lifeLessons.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
lifeLessons.author: Steve Jobs

lifeLessons.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
lifeLessons.author: Theodore Roosevelt

lifeLessons.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
lifeLessons.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

lifeLessons.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
lifeLessons.author: Winston Churchill

lifeLessons.quote: Life's challenges are not supposed to paralyze you; they're supposed to help you discover who you are.
lifeLessons.author: Bernice Johnson Reagon

lifeLessons.quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
lifeLessons.author: Nelson Mandela

lifeLessons.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
lifeLessons.author: Abraham Lincoln

lifeLessons.quote: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
lifeLessons.author: Oscar Wilde

lifeLessons.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
lifeLessons.author: Unknown

lifeLessons.quote: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
lifeLessons.author: Sam Levenson

lifeLessons.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
lifeLessons.author: Confucius

lifeLessons.quote: The best revenge is massive success.
lifeLessons.author: Frank Sinatra

lifeLessons.quote: The future depends on what you do today.
lifeLessons.author: Mahatma Gandhi

lifeLessons.quote: The only person you should try to be better than is the person you were yesterday.
lifeLessons.author: Unknown

lifeLessons.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
lifeLessons.author: John Lennon

lifeLessons.quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
lifeLessons.author: Albert Schweitzer

lifeLessons.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
lifeLessons.author: Peter Drucker

lifeLessons.quote: Strive not to be a success, but rather to be of value.
lifeLessons.author: Albert Einstein

lifeLessons.quote: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
lifeLessons.author: Charles R. Swindoll

lifeLessons.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
